item.description:
This Friday night we will be heading to the Red Door in Watertown! We are going to be with good people which equals a good time. All are welcome to come out for a good time. We haven't been there in some time but the few times we were it was a huge success and everyone has been wanting to do this.

Let's get social with other people who are attending and most importantly do what we do best.....have fun! If you guys have any questions just email me or call me at 860-919-9782. Until then enjoy. See you there!

Cheers,

John
item.name: The Red Door in Watertown
